extendedInfo.description: Ever wondering or imagining these stuffs?- your new house with new furniture- adding new fancy decorations on your wall- having new tattoo- or probably some wild fantasy like having shark in your bathtub or an alien stand next to youWhy don't you just create the picture on your mind and see it for yourself ??Yes, combining images has never been this easy. With Popmage you can realize everything.Popmage is an easy image editing application that helps you to combine and blend two images easily. Popmage provides easy brush selection tool that helps you to select your desired object from an image and combine your selected object with the other image. Place your selected object on the target image to get the image you want. After the selection process and the placement process are done, all you need to do is click one button and Popmage will do the rest for you. Very quick and easy.*DUE TO WIDE VARIETY OF USES, WE CANNOT GUARANTEE THE RESULT PRODUCED BY THIS APPLICATION. THERE ARE MANY FACTORS THAT CAN AFFECT THE RESULT OF THE APPLICATION BASED ON USERS' CREATIVITY, IDEAS AND EXPERIMENTS. THE APPLICATION MIGHT ALSO WORK DIFFERENTLY IN EACH DIFFERENT DEVICE AND THERE MIGHT ALSO BE SOME ISSUES THAT WE CANNOT COVER SOLELY. WE WILL PROVIDE EXAMPLES AND TIPS ON HOW USING THIS APPLICATION ON OUR WEBSITE THAT CAN BE USED AS REFERENCES. *PLEASE CONTACT US THROUGH EMAIL IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEM WITH THE APPLICATION AS WE WILL NOT BE ABLE TO REPLY THE REVIEWS DIRECTLY. WE WILL TRY OUR BEST TO HELP YOU SOLVE THE PROBLEMS.VISIT OUR BLOG TO GET THE LATEST TUTORIALhttp://blog.popmage.comhaving a cool tutorial to be shared?? please kindly drop us email.Tag: Image Blending, Image Compositing, Image Mixer, Photo Editor, Combine Images, Image Blender, Combine Pictures, Combine Photos, Composite Image, Composite Picture, Picture Blending.

reviews.title: Frustrating.
reviews.comment: When you try to move the cut out image it goes all over place and doesn\'t move the way you want it to. Very frustrating. Fix that and it will be good.
